programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to a Fort Worth, Texas, facility known for its deceptively bad-looking lockers; Lesa Lewis seeks value in an old cookie jar; Moe Prigoff hopes to rebound after missing Walt's auction.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: The Surgeon, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: The buyers nab lockers as a tornado approaches; two bidders band together in the name of profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers seek antiques in the city of DeSoto; a new face from across the pond challenges Ricky and Bubba; David learns how sausage is made; Jenny gives Mary a lift.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to the Texas resort town of Mineral Wells; Ricky and Bubba battle Victor for a luxury locker; a classic lighter could be worth a small fortune.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary meet a qualified wood expert in the Texas town of Waxahachie; Ricky and Bubba find a strange weapon; a buyer listens to the locals to get an edge up on the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary fight for an antique unit worth thousands; Jenny learns about rock 'n' roll; Ricky and Bubba take out the tourist competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers visit the city of Mesquite on one of the hottest days of the year; Vic's protege takes a hit; Mary's discovery leads her to a llama farm.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The locker-lookers return to Montebello, Calif., where Darrell hopes to repeat past successes; Brandi learns that Jarrod is facing an important problem.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders travel to Oxnard, Calif.; Dave seeks gold, but finds bronze; Jarrod fights a cold; Darrell and Brandon have a disagreement.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi uncover the ultimate guy's unit among the lockers in Santa Ana, Calif.; Darrell and Dave battle over a valuable antique.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to Huntington Beach, Calif.; Barry introduces kitsch king Charles Phoenix to the joys of an auction; Darrell loses his home-field advantage.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi hope for a different outcome when the bidders return to Montebello, Calif.; Dave uncovers marketing Americana; Darrell's find could be the biggest in the group's history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dave doesn't buy; Jarrod and Brandi uncover rare Depression-era art; Barry's art goes back to the Mayan culture; Darrell uncovers a possible Wells Fargo stagecoach gun.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mary launches a daring idea while Ivy keeps it old school and targets a working man's unit; Rene wants to focus on the lockers but Dave gets in the way.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Too Many Cooks in the Locker
programme.desc: The buyers invade Ivy's home turf of Lancaster, Calif.; Mary attempts to make a deal with an unexpected ally; Jarrod and Brandi pressure their colleagues; Rene tries to prove his superiority.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry becomes an organ donor; Jarrod and Brandi's profits roll away; Dave chooses not to deal; Darrell's fortunes rest on the flip of a coin.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers look for textbooks and rare university artifacts in Fullerton, Calif.; Barry uncovers antique vinyl; Jarrod and Brandi battle their colleagues.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders battle in Garden Grove, Calif.; Dave raids King Tut's tomb; Darrell forms a new business "adventure" in Germany.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Placentia, Calif., Jarrod and Brandi make a purchase that tips the scales in their favor; Rene and Casey buy a load of luggage; Darrell scores what he thinks is dental equipment.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi and Jarrod argue over a horse head; a locker is littered with antique furniture; Dave makes another strange discovery.

programme.desc: A heavy hitter who has a long history with Dave arrives in Newport Beach, Calif.; Barry visits the doctor.
